text: "The Queen and Me" is a 1982 song by Australian pop rock band Mondo Rock and is the second single from their third studio album Nuovo Mondo. It went to number 40 in Australia. == Track listing == # "The Queen and Me" (Eric McCusker) - 3:21 # "Domination" (Ross Wilson, James Black, Paul Christie) - 4:25 ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Mondo Rock songs
title: The Queen and Me
